meanings.definition: The state or quality of being loose or not tightly fastened.
meanings.sent1: The loosenesses of the rope made it easy to untie.
meanings.sent2: She felt the loosenesses in the knot as she pulled it apart.
meanings.sent3: The loosenesses in the grip of the jar caused it to slip from her hands.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a tangle of thoughts, held together by mere loosenesses.
meanings.sent5: The loosenesses in the fabric allowed the wind to pass through freely.

meanings.definition: Lack of strictness or restraint in behavior or morals.
meanings.sent1: The loosenesses in his parenting style led to unruly behavior in his children.
meanings.sent2: The loosenesses in her approach to work resulted in missed deadlines.
meanings.sent3: His friends teased him about the loosenesses in his fashion choices.
meanings.sent4: The loosenesses in her moral compass made her vulnerable to temptation.
meanings.sent5: The loosenesses in their discipline caused chaos in the classroom.
